Game Rules:
 
 Welcome to the exciting world of Trivial Challenge! In this game of strategy and knowledge, your mission is to traverse the board, face various challenges, and complete mini-games to defeat your opponent. Here s an overview of how the game unfolds:
 
 1. Board Movement:
 - Advance on the board landing on numbered tiles.
 - Each number represents a unique mini-game that you must overcome.
 
 2. Main Mini-Games:
 - There are four main mini-games, each with its own unique challenge:
 a. Review:
 - Answer 5 questions correctly to win.
 - General and low-difficulty questions.
 b. Match Concepts:
 - Connect tiles with words to corresponding images.
 - Complete the task before time runs out to win.
 c. Test:
 - Answer 5 multiple-choice questions.
 - Identify the missing word in the displayed expression.
 d. Hangman:
 - Guess the word by uncovering letters without making 6 mistakes.
 
 3. Final Question:
 - If you complete the four main mini-games, you will reach the final question.
 - You must answer correctly to win the game.
 - Beware! It s the toughest question in the game with 4 possible answers.
 
 Remember, each victory brings you closer to the trophy and honor. Good luck on your journey through the Trivial Challenge!
